description: Test scenarios for evaluating policy compliance checking effectiveness

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Remote Work Policy Compliance - Positive Case
test_scenarios.test_query: Does this policy adequately address data security requirements for remote workers?
expected_findings: Policy requires VPN for all city network access

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Remote Work Policy Compliance - Missing Elements
test_scenarios.test_query: Does this policy include adequate privacy protection measures?
expected_findings: Limited privacy disclosure about monitoring activities
No specific data retention timeframes for performance monitoring
Insufficient detail on employee privacy rights during remote work
test_scenarios.recommendation: Add privacy protection section and monitoring disclosure

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Data Privacy Policy Compliance - Comprehensive Review
test_scenarios.test_query: Does this policy meet GDPR-style privacy requirements?
test_scenarios.recommendation: Policy demonstrates strong privacy compliance framework

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Employee Code of Conduct - Ethics Compliance
test_scenarios.test_query: Does this code of conduct adequately address conflicts of interest?
expected_findings: Missing financial disclosure requirements for senior staff
Unclear gift acceptance thresholds and procedures
No specific guidance on contractor relationships
test_scenarios.recommendation: Significant revision needed for conflict of interest provisions

test_scenarios.test_query: Are the data handling requirements consistent across these policies?
expected_findings: Remote work policy allows 4-hour response time for communications
Privacy policy requires 1-hour notification for security incidents
test_scenarios.recommendation: Harmonize response timeframes and data handling procedures

test_scenarios.test_query: Does this policy address all required elements under NYC Local Law 245?
expected_findings: No specific mention of automated decision-making processes
Insufficient detail on automated processing notification
No specific provisions for algorithmic bias assessment
test_scenarios.recommendation: Add NYC Local Law 245 specific requirements for automated systems

test_scenarios.test_query: Does this policy include all essential elements for effective implementation?
Is this policy written in plain language accessible to all employees?
expected_findings: Extensive use of technical jargon without definitions
Limited use of examples and practical scenarios
test_scenarios.recommendation: Simplify language and add practical examples for better accessibility
